resources.string: Q1: Canberra is the capital of Australia.
Q2: The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
Q3: The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
Q4: The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
Q5: The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas
Q6: Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
